'''''Cantus Aeternus''''' is the third [[Fontaine]] Chapter [[soundtrack]].

It features a total of 39 soundtracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team, each one an original compositions for Fontaine and the related content in [[Version 4.6]].

The album was first announced on April 12, 2024, during the [[Special Program]] for Version 4.6. The tracklist was announced on May 13, 2024 and the album was released on May 14, 2024.<ref>Sina Weibo: [https://weibo.com/6593199887/Oe4vYy2k8 {{zh|「《原神》第三张枫丹篇OST即将上线 」}}]</ref>

==Trivia==
* The title of the first disc, {{it|Versi di Petrichor}}, is Italian for "verses of [[Petrichor]]."
* The title of the second disc, ''Sumphonia Capitolii'', is Latin for "symphony of Capitolium."
